name: Thesis Project
description:
This game is a prototype for a master thesis for Medialogy. The application should run in your browser, though it may not work in certain browsers such as Safari or Edge. You will play a short game, and then be redirected to an online questionnaire which should take about 10 to 15 minutes to complete. Note that since both the game and the web player control your mouse, you may have to press ESC multiple times in order to click the button to begin the questionnaire.

Initial loading times may be long, if your browser says it is unresponsive please try to wait a bit longer. 

If you have encountered any issues and cannot complete the game (i.e. do not reach the point where you are redirected to a questionnaire), then please give us feedback about the issues you encountered. 

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys

Look: Mouse

Run: Shift

Jump: Space Bar
